subSections.title: Etymology
subSections.text:
Traditionally it is considered that {{zh-l|商人}} is so named because this term originally refers to people from Shang dynasty, who tend to do business.

{{zh-ref|Schuessler, 2007}} lists two possible origins:

# {{och-l|賒}} + ŋ, which may be related to {{cog|th|แลก}};
# from Tibeto-Burman *lay or *b-ley
